Branding & Interactive Concept

5 Gyres

5Gyres is a non-profit with aims to help stop the pollution in the five Oceanic Gyres. They focus on outreach, education, and activism with particular interest in stopping plastic pollution.


Problem

5Gyres previous site was difficult to navigate and their brand lacked a feeling of action and energy.

Solution

In order to promote interest in their cause they needed a new identity that was powerful and stood out from similar non-profits and more user-friendly and navigable site. I created concept work to include a logo and web wireframes.

Branding

Type, color, and mark

Typography & Color

Oceanic colors are both calm and refreshing. A punch of orange is included for call to actions. Bold and clean type provides clarity, reassurance, and gives a confident and urgent voice to the brand.


Simple Application of logo

Making an Icon

It was important that 5Gyres be bold and memorable. The mark I created references the cyclical nature of water, recycling, and doing good. It also references the vortex like shape of the oceans gyres.

Web Mockups

Mobile and Desktop mockup

First Impressions

New one page based layout with major call to actions to help provide clarity and guide future donors and volunteers to the section that most interest and benefits them.

High Fidelity wireframes
